body_html:
...ewwww... this reminds me of the bad old PHP days, when someone decided it would be a good idea to addslashes to all _GET parameters, and then everyone was perpetually confused as to whether or not their variables had backslashes or not.

I'll accept this patch assuming (1) it says what it does and (2) explains what specific situation you've noticed where it is double escaped.

body:
...ewwww... this reminds me of the bad old PHP days, when someone decided it would be a good idea to `addslashes` to all `_GET` parameters, and then everyone was perpetually confused as to whether or not their variables had backslashes or not.

I'll accept this patch assuming (1) it says what it does and (2) explains what specific situation you've noticed where it is double escaped.
